metadata.name: Supreme Court Affidavit
metadata.description: Affidavit template for filing before the Supreme Court of India. Follows Supreme Court Rules 2013 formatting standards with proper verification clause.

required_fields.label: Deponent Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the person making the affidavit

required_fields.label: Deponent Address
required_fields.description: Complete residential address of the deponent

required_fields.label: Deponent Occupation
required_fields.description: Profession or occupation of the deponent

required_fields.label: Statement of Facts
required_fields.description: The facts and statements being affirmed under oath
required_fields.example: 1. I am the petitioner in the above matter. 2. The facts stated in the petition are true to my knowledge.

required_fields.label: Verification Place
required_fields.description: Place where the affidavit is verified and sworn

optional_fields.label: Case Reference
optional_fields.description: Related case number if affidavit is filed in pending proceedings

optional_fields.label: List of Exhibits
optional_fields.description: List of documents attached as exhibits to the affidavit
optional_fields.example: Annexure A - Copy of FIR, Annexure B - Medical Report

template_content:
IN THE SUPREME COURT OF INDIA
[CIVIL/CRIMINAL] [ORIGINAL/APPELLATE] JURISDICTION

[CASE TYPE] NO. _____ OF _____

IN THE MATTER OF:
_______________
... Petitioner(s)

Versus

_______________
... Respondent(s)

AFFIDAVIT

I, {deponent_name}, aged about _____ years, {deponent_occupation}, resident of {deponent_address}, do hereby solemnly affirm and state as under:

{statement_facts}

VERIFICATION

I, the above-named deponent, do hereby verify that the contents of this affidavit are true and correct to my knowledge and belief, no part of it is false and nothing material has been concealed therefrom.

Verified at {verification_place} on this _____ day of _____, 2024.

DEPONENT

SOLEMNLY AFFIRMED BEFORE ME

NOTARY PUBLIC / OATH COMMISSIONER
